row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: I would like to receive from you a detailed report on current market conditions every month .
sentences.chinese: 我想每月收到你方一份具體確當前市場行情報告。

sentences.english: There are contracts that have to be liquidated after a big trend.
sentences.chinese: 在大行情然後有些合同要被平掉。

sentences.english: We easystonly we price according to the international markets.
sentences.chinese: 咱們是根據世紀留洋探索的行情來調整價格的。

sentences.english: The price you give us is out of line with the market.
sentences.chinese: 如果你方價格符合行情，我們可以接受。

sentences.english: The Wall Street Journal gives a daily report of the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 《華爾街日報》每天報告股市行情。

sentences.english: Star of securities by the introduction of a new generation of market analysis software.
sentences.chinese: 由證券之星推出的新一代行情分析軟件。

sentences.english: The Ans the stock just cut a camalig and you said instauration condition of the market a beginning again.
sentences.chinese: 俺們剛股票斬倉你們又說恢復性行情開始了。

sentences.english: The original lucky star big market, packed with the latest version of the software trade.
sentences.chinese: 原版的大福星行情繫統，打包了最新版的交易軟件。

sentences.english: Future cationic silk prices projected to a smooth adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 預計後市陽離子絲價格行情還將以平穩調整爲主。

sentences.english: He is anxious to read the share prices.
sentences.chinese: 她急於想了解股票的行情。

sentences.english: The stock market will soon rally.
sentences.chinese: 股票行情不久即將回升。

sentences.english: But because of a current glut in the market, the average rate of depreciation has nearly doubled.
sentences.chinese: 但是按照現在的市場行情，平均折舊率是以前的兩倍。

sentences.english: Difference of cationic silk market improved, sold steadily increasing.
sentences.chinese: 差別化的陽離子絲市場行情好轉，成交價穩中有升。

sentences.english: Suggest buy small lot for feeling market telegraph.
sentences.chinese: 建議試買少量以探行情，並請電告結果。

sentences.english: The trend is real. I'll invest, but only if the price is right.
sentences.chinese: 看來這波行情是真的，等到價格合適的時候我在入場。

sentences.english: So, it should not be surprised to see an oversold relief bounce in the coming days.
sentences.chinese: 因此未來數日標普出現超跌反彈行情是不足爲奇的。

definition: to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
